alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 15 at 8:46PM EDT until August 15 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WALTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HOLMES COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Samson to near Baker, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Hickory Hill, Piney Grove, Argyle, Mossy Head and Fox Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
